name: Super Space Shooter (Kaxu Games)
description:
Game made during a Game Maker Studio course.

Controls:

Space  - Fire

E - Shield

A - Move left

S - Move down

D - Move right

W - Move up

Power Ups:

Maroon - Improves fire

Yellow - Increases fire rate

Green - Increases speed

Credits:

Musics:

"Darkling" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
